languages.text: Зверь пал ниц и стал рвать себя на части. Ибо слово истинной веры усмиряет и наполняет стыдом и ненавистью к себе даже злейший из пороков.
The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.
languages.original_text: Зверь пал ниц и стал рвать себя на части. Ибо слово истинной веры усмиряет и наполняет стыдом и ненавистью к себе даже злейший из пороков.

traits.locale_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of vices, and fill it with shame and self-loathing.

The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.

languages.text: Die Bestie warf sich zu Boden und begann, ihren eigenen Körper zu zerreißen. Denn Worte wahren Glaubens befrieden selbst das schlimmste Böse mit einem Gefühl der Scham und Selbstverachtung.
languages.original_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.

traits.locale_text: Die Bestie warf sich zu Boden und begann, ihren eigenen Körper zu zerreißen. Denn Worte wahren Glaubens befrieden selbst das schlimmste Böse mit einem Gefühl der Scham und Selbstverachtung.

languages.text: La bestia se postró y empezó a despedazar su propio cuerpo. Pues las palabras de la fe verdadera apaciguan a los mayores males con una sensación de vergüenza y odio hacia sí.
languages.original_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.

traits.locale_text: La bestia se postró y empezó a despedazar su propio cuerpo. Pues las palabras de la fe verdadera apaciguan a los mayores males con una sensación de vergüenza y odio hacia sí.

languages.text: 獣はひれ伏し、自らの体を引き裂き始めた。真の振興の言葉は、羞恥心と自己嫌悪でもって最悪の悪をも鎮めるのだから。
languages.original_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.

traits.locale_text: 獣はひれ伏し、自らの体を引き裂き始めた。真の振興の言葉は、羞恥心と自己嫌悪でもって最悪の悪をも鎮めるのだから。

languages.text: 怪物匍匐在地，撕扯起了自己的身体。因为真正信仰的话语甚至足以兵不血刃地消灭最邪恶的敌人，让他们被羞愧与自我厌恶压垮。
languages.original_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.

traits.locale_text: 怪物匍匐在地，撕扯起了自己的身体。因为真正信仰的话语甚至足以兵不血刃地消灭最邪恶的敌人，让他们被羞愧与自我厌恶压垮。

languages.text: La bête se prosterna et commença à lacérer son propre corps. Car les paroles de la foi véritable inspirent un sentiment de honte et de dégoût de soi pour apaiser même les pires des maux.
languages.original_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.

traits.locale_text: La bête se prosterna et commença à lacérer son propre corps. Car les paroles de la foi véritable inspirent un sentiment de honte et de dégoût de soi pour apaiser même les pires des maux.

languages.text: Ardından yaratık, yerlere kapanarak kendi bedenini parçalarına ayırmaya başladı. Zira hakiki inancın sözleri, en ürkütücü habislikleri bile utanç ve kendinden nefret etme hissiyle yatıştırabilir.
languages.original_text: The beast prostrated itself and began to tear its own body apart. For words of true faith pacify even the worst of evils with a sense of shame and self-loathing.
